about_the_game:
In an alternate 1980's metropolitan city, crime reigns supreme and the law of the land is non-existent. Choose your own adventure and face the consequences, such as taking care of your wife's needs or your waifus' desires.

Take on the role of an arcade owner who is desperate to make ends meat. Your method of cashflow... selling guns to anyone who walks through the door, just not the wrong people...

The 1980's comes to life in a neon lit arcade full of adventures and problems that you are faced with.

Guncade is open for business and the customers are pouring in, ready to hand over the cash in exchange for your wares.

name: Guncade Demo
short_description: Guncade is a 1980's arcade lovers dream, if that dream also involves being an arms dealer to grannies, clowns, and other suspicious people. Journey through this visual novel and decide who to cater to and who can buzz off.
